nodes.text: The TransGalMeg Industries Conference Center was located in the city of Toggeus, on the planet Narg. Moff Nile Owen and Admiral Sahreel went to the facility in an effort to take custody of Crying Dawn Singer from Braig Farool, only to learn that the Shashay was being held in the TransGalMeg Industries, Incorporated Administration Center on the other side of the planet.
